data.title: Biennale Arte 2022 - The Milk of Dreams - Short Guide
data.meta_description:
A JOURNEY THROUGH THE BIENNALE ARTE 2022
The Short Guide to the Biennale Arte 2022, titled The Milk of Dreams, is designed to lead visitors through...
data.text: A JOURNEY THROUGH THE BIENNALE ARTE 2022 The Short Guide to the Biennale Arte 2022, titled The Milk of Dreams, is designed to lead visitors through the exhibition spaces of the Arsenale and the Giardini, and point them to other projects situated throughout the city of Venice during the 59th International Art Exhibition curated by Cecilia Alemani. Both a practical guide and a souvenir volume, the book introduces the readers to the work of the artists in the International Exhibition, the National Participations of the 59th International Art Exhibition and the Collateral Events taking place across the Metropolitan City of Venice between 23 April and 27 November 2022. The graphic identity of the Biennale Arte 2022 and the publicationsâ€™ design are by A Practice for Everyday Life, London.
